project_descr: Climate Change Resilience and Disaster Risk Reduction for National Transformation.

outputs.output_descr: The programme will support GoU to strengthen; policy response on integration, provision of incentives & deterrents measures; national policy implementation capacities; LGs to build a strong community resilient to climate change and other disasters
